NAME: Begin lines with 'comment\t' for a safe comment experience
Lines that aren't formed to expectation will not halt the program but will throw errors to stderr
The accepted values for TYPE are "Comment", "Event", "Timeline", and "Character"
In general, it is best to order the input file so the order is Timelines > Events > Characters.

TYPE: Comment This ordering is not enforced, but breaking it increases the likeihood of a failure to parse due to missing reference.

NAME: See the module docstring for storyboard.py for further format details
